segment.source: How to use the Browsing Options page in the IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to manage items in the Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds section.
segment.target: How to use the Browsing Options page in the IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to manage items in the Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds section.

segment.source: Use the Browsing Options page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Use the Browsing Options page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Use the Browsing Options page in the IEAK 11 Wizard
segment.target: Use the Browsing Options page in the IEAK 11 Wizard

segment.source: The Browsing Options page of the Internet Explorer Administration Kit (IEAK 11) Customization Wizard lets you decide how you want to manage items in the Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds section, including the Microsoft-provided default items.
segment.target: The Browsing Options page of the Internet Explorer Administration Kit (IEAK 11) Customization Wizard lets you decide how you want to manage items in the Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds section, including the Microsoft-provided default items.

segment.source: The choices that you make on this page affect only the items shown on the Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds page.
segment.target: The choices that you make on this page affect only the items shown on the Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds page.

segment.source: To use the Browsing Options page
segment.target: To use the Browsing Options page

segment.source: Decide how you want to manage links that are already installed on your employee’s computer:
segment.target: Decide how you want to manage links that are already installed on your employee’s computer:

segment.source: Delete all existing items under Favorites, Favorites Bar and Feeds.
segment.target: Delete all existing items under Favorites, Favorites Bar and Feeds.

segment.source: Removes all of the links, Web Slices, feeds, and Accelerators on the computer.
segment.target: Removes all of the links, Web Slices, feeds, and Accelerators on the computer.

segment.source: This includes links and favorites added by you or the employee.
segment.target: This includes links and favorites added by you or the employee.

segment.source: Because this removes everything, we recommend that you use this option with caution.
segment.target: Because this removes everything, we recommend that you use this option with caution.

segment.source: Only delete the items created by the administrator.
segment.target: Only delete the items created by the administrator.

segment.source: Removes only the items that you added for your employees on the Favorites, Favorites Bar and Feeds page.
segment.target: Removes only the items that you added for your employees on the Favorites, Favorites Bar and Feeds page.

segment.source: Don’t delete any items.
segment.target: Don’t delete any items.

segment.source: Doesn’t remove anything.
segment.target: Doesn’t remove anything.

segment.source: Links Web Slices, feeds, and Accelerators are added to your employee computers at the top of the list, in the order you picked on the Favorites, Favorites Bar and Feeds page.
segment.target: Links Web Slices, feeds, and Accelerators are added to your employee computers at the top of the list, in the order you picked on the Favorites, Favorites Bar and Feeds page.

segment.source: Decide if you don’t want to add the Microsoft-default items:
segment.target: Decide if you don’t want to add the Microsoft-default items:

segment.source: Favorites.
segment.target: Favorites.

segment.source: Checking this box won’t add the Microsoft-defined links.
segment.target: Checking this box won’t add the Microsoft-defined links.

segment.source: Web Slices and Links.
segment.target: Web Slices and Links.

segment.source: Checking this box won’t add the Microsoft-defined Web Slices or links.
segment.target: Checking this box won’t add the Microsoft-defined Web Slices or links.

segment.source: Feeds.
segment.target: Feeds.

segment.source: Checking this box won’t add the Microsoft-defined RSS feeds.
segment.target: Checking this box won’t add the Microsoft-defined RSS feeds.

segment.source: Accelerators.
segment.target: Accelerators.

segment.source: Checking this box won’t add the Microsoft-defined Accelerators.
segment.target: Checking this box won’t add the Microsoft-defined Accelerators.

segment.source: Click Next to go to the First Run Wizard and Welcome Page Options page or Back to go to the Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds page.
segment.target: Click Next to go to the First Run Wizard and Welcome Page Options page or Back to go to the Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds page.
